description: Once a month, the avid readers on our Justia team choose a book and then discuss what they think about their most recent read. Last year, they read 11 books with Project Hail Mary by Andy Weir being the crowd favorite!
Our sweet girl, Zoey the Hug Pug, is loving her bummlie toys and giving them lots of squeezes this month. She's also giving her peeps extra cuddles for Valentine's Day.
